html.h1: 1. Execute |cypher to run a cypher command on your Neo4j instance.
html.p: Use one of following commands to try it out, once you configured this app, replacing the parameters for uri and account:
Escape double quotes in the cypher_querysstring.

pre.code: | cypher uri=<my_uri_id> account=<my_account_id> noact=f query="match (n) return ID(n), labels(n), properties(n)" | cypher uri=<my_uri_id> account=<my_account_id> noact=f query="CALL db.schema.visualization()" | cypher uri=<my_uri_id> account=<my_account_id> noact=f query="CALL db.labels()"
